page.title: 14LITTLE BARTON FARM
page.content: This is a fruitfarm immediately S.E of Canterbury.The growing space is approximately 660 acres (267 ha.).This includes 460 acres of apples,128 acres of pears and 44 acres of plums (plus some strawberries and blackberries).Labour comprises 39 male staff,and 34 females.Machinery includes 15 tractors,5 top-fruit sprayers,4 sets of grass mowers and other equipment for orchard maintenance.Crops:each year approximately 5000 tons of apples and pears.20% is marketed as it is picked in August and September,20% goes into cold-store for Oct-Nov marketing,the remainder going into long term storage for December to May (with contolled atmosphere and low-temperature).All fruit marketing is done through Home Grown Fruits Ltd. of Canterbury.
